text: Merril Bainbridge (born 2 June 1968) is an Australian pop music singer and songwriter. Her debut was in 1994 with the single, "Mouth", which peaked at number one for six consecutive weeks in Australia and became a top five hit in the United States. ==See also== *Edie Brickell and the Bohemians *Paula Cole *Linda Perry *Susan Tedeschi *Juliana Hatfield Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Australian singers
title: Merril Bainbridge
